label1.title: Deltoid Muscle -- Function
label1.text: <font size = 6><center>Functions to move the upper arm away from the body</center></font size = 6>

label2.title: Deltoid Muscle -- Innervation
label2.text: <font size = 6><center>Is stimulated by the axillary nerve</center></font size = 6>

label3.title: Deltoid Muscle -- Location
label3.text: <font size = 6><center>Resides on the side of the upper arm at the shoulder</center></font size = 6>

label4.title: Digital Flexor Muscles -- Function
label4.text: <font size = 6><center>Function together to flex the fingers</center></font size = 6>

label5.title: Digital Flexor Muscles -- Innervation
label5.text: <font size = 6><center>Are stimulated by the median and ulnar nerves</center></font size = 6>

label6.title: Digital Flexor Muscles -- Location
label6.text: <font size = 6><center>Reside on the front of the forearm when the palm is facing forward</center></font size = 6>

label7.title: Triceps Muscle -- Function
label7.text: <font size = 6><center>Functions to extend the lower arm at the elbow</center></font size = 6>

label8.title: Triceps Muscle -- Innervation
label8.text: <font size = 6><center>Is stimulated by the radial nerve</center></font size = 6>

label9.title: Triceps Muscle -- Location
label9.text: <font size = 6><center>Resides on the back of the arm</center></font size = 6>
